definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: You've had a bowl haircut at one point in your life.
sentences.chinese: 你一生中理過至少一次鍋蓋頭。

sentences.english: What is it like filming the scenes in Jarhead?
sentences.chinese: 在鍋蓋頭裏拍這樣的戲是什麼樣的呢？
